title: Bangladesh News Articles Dataset
subtitle: Daily scraped news from 74+ major Bangladeshi newspapers (English & Bangla)
description:
# üì∞ Bangladesh News Articles Dataset

A comprehensive, **daily-updated** collection of news articles from major Bangladeshi newspapers. This is the largest open-source Bangladeshi news dataset, automatically scraped and updated via GitHub Actions.

---

## ÔøΩ Dataset Overview

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **Sources** | 74+ Bangladeshi newspapers |
| **Languages** | English & Bengali (Bangla) |
| **Update Frequency** | Daily (12:00 PM Bangladesh Time) |
| **License** | CC0 1.0 (Public Domain) |
| **Format** | JSON, CSV, Excel, Parquet |

---

## üì∞ Newspaper Sources

### English Newspapers
- **The Daily Star** - Bangladesh's leading English daily
- **Prothom Alo** (English) - Most circulated newspaper
- **BD News 24** - 24/7 news portal
- **Dhaka Tribune** - Independent daily
- **The Business Standard** - Business & economy focus
- **UNB** - United News of Bangladesh
- **Daily Sun** - National English daily

### Bengali (Bangla) Newspapers
- **Prothom Alo** - Highest circulation
- **Jugantor** - Popular Bengali daily
- **Samakal** - Leading Bengali newspaper
- **Jago News 24** - Online news portal
- **Rising BD** - Digital news platform
- **Naya Diganta** - Conservative daily
- **Manab Zamin** - National daily
- **BD Pratidin** - Popular tabloid
- **Barta 24** - 24-hour news

### International (Bengali Service)
- **BBC Bangla** - BBC's Bengali service
- **DW Bangla** - Deutsche Welle Bengali

---

## üìÇ Available Files

| File | Format | Best For |
|------|--------|----------|
| `articles.json` | JSON | Web development, APIs, JavaScript |
| `articles.csv` | CSV | Excel, Google Sheets, pandas, R |
| `articles.xlsx` | Excel | Microsoft Excel, LibreOffice |
| `articles.parquet` | Parquet | Big data, Spark, Dask, analytics |

---

## ÔøΩ Data Schema

| Column | Type | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| `headline` | string | Article title/headline |
| `sub_title` | string | Article subtitle (may be null) |
| `article_body` | string | Full article text content |
| `url` | string | Original article URL |
| `publication_date` | datetime | When the article was published |
| `category` | string | News category (Politics, Sports, Business, etc.) |
| `paper_name` | string | Source newspaper name |
| `scraped_at` | datetime | When the article was scraped |

---

## üéØ Use Cases

### Natural Language Processing (NLP)
- **Sentiment Analysis** - Analyze public opinion on events
- **Text Classification** - Categorize news by topic
- **Summarization** - Train abstractive/extractive summarizers
- **Named Entity Recognition** - Extract people, places, organizations

### Machine Learning
- **Bengali Language Models** - Train/fine-tune LLMs for Bengali
- **Topic Modeling** - Discover trending topics
- **Headline Generation** - Generate headlines from article bodies

### Research & Analysis
- **Media Bias Analysis** - Compare coverage across newspapers
- **Event Detection** - Track breaking news and events
- **Trend Analysis** - Monitor news trends over time

---

## üîÑ Automatic Updates

This dataset is **automatically updated daily** at 12:00 PM Bangladesh Time (06:00 UTC) via GitHub Actions. Each update scrapes the latest articles from all sources and appends them to the existing data.

---

## üì¶ Source Code

Data collected using **[BDNewsPaperScraper](https://github.com/EhsanulHaqueSiam/BDNewsPaperScraper)** - the largest open-source Bangladeshi news scraping project.

### Features:
- 74+ newspaper spiders
- Cloudflare bypass support
- API-based extraction where available
- Deduplication built-in
- Multiple export formats

---
